snippet: The increase will generate $15 million per year for the union and is the first raise in 47 years.
abstract: United Auto Workers delegates vote to raise dues by 25 percent in effort to shore up union’s finances; increase, which will cost average longtime autoworker making $28 per hour about $14 more per month, will raise $15 million per year for union.
lead_paragraph: The increase will generate $15 million per year for the union and is the first raise in 47 years.

headline.main: United Auto Workers Vote to Raise Dues 25 Percent
headline.print_headline: United Auto Workers Vote to Raise Dues 25 Percent
